attributes.action: to provide two years funding to enable the local Parentline office to stay open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Parentline Plus local office based at The Park, Knowle, Bristol, is preparing for closure due to losing the bid from the Parenting Fund.
This charity run service helps over 500 parents each year, and provides workshops, groupwork, telephone and one to one support, grandparents and kinship carers group, and extended telephone based support/coaching.
Parents need support at some stage and Parentline plus want to be here to do that, to help with parenting issues, because "instructions aren't included!" Parents supporting Parents.
